attributes.action: abolish the presposterous idea that the National Challenge will raise standards in difficult schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has targeted for  closure (or re-opening as an academy) the 638 worst performing schools in England, thus once again ignoring the difficulties and problems these schools face whilst throughout  destroying the morale of teachers and students alike. 

Once again, this government is sticking to its target driven  culture which is systematically undermining the effort and commitment of teachers and students whilst all the time reducing our education system to one which is second rate.

rejection.details: Government can not abolish an idea...pls. reword and resubmit
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
